page.title: 19District Cub Camp
page.content:
On Friday 14th June{Paul and I arrived at{Brindsby Agricultural {College, Adversane, West Sussex for the{District Cub Camp. We went to bed at 10 p.m. but we only slept for about three hours because we were so excited. The next morning we started our activities. There were five bases with different activities at each. We were given 15 minutes at each base. Base 1 - we had to make and fly a kite Base 2 - cross an assault course Base 3 - follow ropes bindfolded Base 4 - make a collage from plants and leaves Base 5 - a treasure hunt
We were awarded points for how well we worked, we came first with 82 points and won the Camper's Shield.
